name: Stride Staked Evmos
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en: stEVMOS is a token received in exchange for staking EVMOS with Stride. By staking EVMOS with Stride, users can earn stEVMOS, which are redeemable for EVMOS at a 1:1 ratio, subject to the unbonding period on EVMOS. With stEVMOS, users can retain liquidity in their staked tokens while also earning staking rewards, giving them the ability to take advantage of Evmos' in-app economy and pursue more yields within the ecosystem.
